content: During the 1.8 upgrade our server somehow lost 20 minutes of time. This is almost certainly related to our machine and not the upgrade, but figured I'd mention it in case other upgrades ran into it. We were only upgrading from 10 commits behind 1.8.0, so it seems doubtful.
@Sean Wallitsch by this, do you mean time as in it got 20 minutes of NTP synchronization off?
I agree that seems likely something with the machine; the only thing we do that has to do with time is a dependency on ntp so that Zulip servers are likely to have accurate time :smiley:
correct, it was 20 minutes in the past
